WorkItem.ClosedComment: The Opening Point Requested for is already in the program
WorkItem.Description:
My loot master gets frustrated when people take a long time to make a decision.  Rawr does not make it easy to find the score for a specific item, so I would like to be able to exploit Pawn scores so I can know when an item is worth looking up in Rawr.
Â 
If the Relative Stat Values panel had a Pawn-syntax specification I could cut&paste into the game, that would make it easy for me to update the Pawn spec every time I change a piece of gear.
WorkItem.Summary: please add a clipboard-able Pawn spec at the bottom of the Relative Stat Values

Comments.Message: To my knowledge, there is already an export to pawn.  If you go to the relevant stats panel, and click the Export dropdown on the top right, you can click "Copy Pawn string to Clipboard".  Or are you referring to something else?

Yeah, that's already there. However, I'm most concerned with "Rawr does not make it easy to find the score for a specific item"... What are you even talking about? Sounds like you're doing something significantly wrong if it's not easy to find the value of a specific item.
